TITLE Red Enchilada Sauce

{[Prepare Chilies]
* Skip if using pre-ground guajillo.
# Preheat oven to 350F. Place [4 item guajillo chiles ] on a baking sheet and heat in oven until puffed up and aromatic, about 3-5 minutes.
# Remove from the oven and allow to cool. Stem and seed chiles; tear into pieces.
}
{[Make Sauce]
# Heat [1 tbl olive oil] in a large saucepan over medium-high heat until shimmering.
# Toast [1 oz guajillo chiles], [1/4 tsp cumin], and [1/4 tsp black pepper], [2 cloves garlic], until fragant.
# Add [28 oz fire roasted tomatoes] and [2 cup chicken broth]; simmer for 15 minutes. Season with [salt] to taste.
# Puree until smooth. Sieve if desired.
}
